newsitem.title: USA: Liz Claiborne acquires Dooney & Bourke.
newsitem.headline: Liz Claiborne acquires Dooney & Bourke.

text.p: Liz Claiborne Inc. said on Wednesday it has agreed to acquire Dooney & Bourke Cos., a manufacturer and marketer of handbags and leather goods, for an undisclosed amount of cash.
Dooney & Bourke, with a current product line consisting of handbags, luggage, belts and small leather goods, is best known for its distinctive "All-Weather Leather."
Liz Claiborne said that the acquisition of Norwalk, Conn.-based Dooney & Bourke was expected to be accretive to earnings in the first full year following the acquisition.
The acquisition will complement Liz Claiborne's accessories operation and allow it to offer a broader range of styles and price points, the company said.
Liz Claiborne designs and markets an extensive range of women's fashion apparel and accessories.
